Structs/AliasKey.html.abstract: A value representing an Entity or set of Entity

Structs/EntityObserver.html.name: EntityObserver

Protocols/Logger.html#/s:11CohesionKit6L.name: didStore(_:id:)

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: init(queue:logger:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Create a new EntityStore instance optionally with a queue and a logger

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: store(entity:named:modifiedAt:ifPresent:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Store an entity in the storage. Entity will be stored only if stamp (modifiedAt) is higher than in previous

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: store(entity:named:modifiedAt:ifPresent:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Store an aggregate in the storage. Each aggregate entities will be stored only if stamp (modifiedAt) is higher than in previous

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: find(_:id:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Try to find an entity/aggregate in the storage.

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: find(named:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Try to find an entity/aggregate registered under named alias

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: find(named:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Try to find a collected registered under named alias

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: update(_:id:modifiedAt:update:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Updates an already stored entity using a closure. Useful to update a few properties or when you assume the entity

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: update(_:id:modifiedAt:_:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Updates an already stored alias using a closure. This is useful if you don’t have a full entity for update

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: update(named:modifiedAt:update:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Updates an already stored alias using a closure.

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: update(named:modifiedAt:update:)
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Updates an already stored alias using a closure.

Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.name: removeAll()
Classes/EntityStore.html#/s:11CohesionKi.abstract: Removes all alias AND all objects stored weakly. You should not need this method and rather use removeAlias.
